column2: an A.M. Eatery////Incredibly slow. Waited 45 minutes for a table at 10:15. Then waited one hour for food. One. Whole. Hour. Did not refill water or offer to bring more coffee in that hour. Food was good
column3: but really lousy service. Waiter was friendly
column4: but a kitchen that takes an hour to prepare egg dishes is indicative of management that doesn't care about customers.
